instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under USER AND BACKUP, tap Accounts. Under MY ACCOUNTS , tap + add account . Tap Email . Enter your email address and password. Tap Manual setup . Select email account type. Enter incoming server information. Verify username and password. If necessary, edit the account name or your name. Tap Next . Enter outgoing server information and then tap Next . Verify the account options and then tap Next . Tap Done . Tap Next .

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under USER AND BACKUP , tap Accounts . Under MY ACCOUNTS , tap the account you want to delete. Tap the account name at the top of the screen. Tap the Menu icon. Tap Remove account . Tap Remove account again to confirm.
